title: The 'Lovely' Old Dears 2
description: "They may have a knack for murder but when it came to kidnapping, they were woefully inadequate."After the events of "The 'Lovely' Old Dears", Pam and Jean go on the run to evade the long arm of the law. Holed up in a Bed & Breakfast, and with a hostage in tow, they try to come up with a plan. Easier said than done for this pair of over the hill serial killers.
author: David      Richards
